## memoize() function

Memoizes the provided function, caching its results based on the arguments.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export declare function memoize<T extends Fn.Callable>(fn: T, options?: MemoizeOptions<T>): T;
```

## Parameters

<table><thead><tr><th>

Parameter


</th><th>

Type


</th><th>

Description


</th></tr></thead>
<tbody><tr><td>

fn


</td><td>

T


</td><td>

The function to memoize.


</td></tr>
<tr><td>

options


</td><td>

[MemoizeOptions](./toolkit.memoizeoptions.md)<!-- -->&lt;T&gt;


</td><td>

_(Optional)_ Optional memoization options.


</td></tr>
</tbody></table>
**Returns:**

T

The memoized function.

## Example


```ts
const sum = (a: number, b: number) => a + b;

const memoizedSum = memoize(sum);

memoizedSum(1, 2); // 3
memoizedSum(1, 2); // 3 (cached)
```
